content: warg is the name of the log-based registry protocol proposed in the Registries SIG that we spoke about at Cloud Native Wasm Day this week. For more info, visit https://warg.io

The talk on Warg I submitted with @Nathaniel McCallum for Cloud Native Security Con has been accepted.
You can find more info about it here: https://sched.co/1FV31
